originalText.text: Sunshine Tutoring has been an incredible resource for my kid’s educational journey. Farida and her team of tutors has consistently provided exceptional support and guidance, ensuring my kids' academic success. With years of experience, Sunshine Tutoring is the go-to choice for anyone seeking reliable and effective tutoring services.

text.text: Sunshine Tutoring has been an incredible resource for my kid’s educational journey. Farida and her team of tutors has consistently provided exceptional support and guidance, ensuring my kids' academic success. originalText.text:
We used Sunshine for help with SHSAT preparation.  Omar and Ari were wonderful with our son.  They provided extremely personalized attention for him and appropriate for his skill-level homework.  Our son got an offer from his #1 choice in SHSAT high schools.  We are thrilled with the preparation help he received from Sunshine.  Thanks so much!
Update: we also used Sunshine for our 6th grader to study for the Hunter exam in early 2023, and our second son got in!  Omar and Ari gave him just the right coaching and feedback, thank you!

originalText.text: My 4 year old son has been with My Sunshine Tutoring Center for 8 months now. I have seen tremendous improvement and continue to see progress in his studies with every single session. Before we started with My Sunshine, I never thought my child would be able to use such logical explanations to problem solve and advance so quickly in phonics. Farida has been extremely helpful in easing the anxiety of my son taking the Gifted & Talented test. She takes the time to fully explain everything to him, giving him the confidence that he needs to excel. I highly recommend My Sunshine Tutoring Center!!

originalText.text: Was very beneficial for our 4 year old daughter to be tutored there!  She scored 99% on the NYC kindergarten gifted test for admissions. Farida has a holistic approach to tutoring that takes in the emotional well-being of children and methods along with academics. She gave us excellent tips to practice at home too that help with kid’s reasoning, verbal and math skills. Esma is a good and patient teacher.  Would recommend My Sunshine tutoring at any age in addition to school.

originalText.text: Our son has been attending Farida’s classes for over 4 months now. Over this period, we have noticed a remarkable increase in his cognitive, analytical and comprehension skills. Farida has taken acute care in making sure our son is developing the right, age appropriate verbal, math, and language skills. Farida’s teachings are a great compliment to our son’s traditional pre-school education. Using tactics that are engaging, Farida is able to capture our son’s attention and foster a sense of curiosity enabling him to enjoy his learning experience. Her hands on approach lends to undivided attention. She is in continuous contact with us and keeps us informed on our son’s development. We couldn’t be more pleased with how our son has progressed over the last few months. His Russian has improved remarkably, he demonstrates logical and critical thinking in his approach, and finally his understanding of simple math is clearly observable in everyday interactions. We recommend Farida without any reservation.
